metadata.title: CVE-2024-36921 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: guard against invalid STA ID on removalGuard against invalid station IDs in iwl_mvm_mld_rm_sta_id as that wouldresult in out-of-bounds array accesses. This prevents issues should thedriver get into a bad state during error handling.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
